mapper.select: select cb.course_name, cb.teachers, cb.capacity, cb.stu_number, cb.course_type_id, cb.score, cts.class_name, cts.info_str, cb.campus_id from course_base cb join course_time_schedule cts on cb.seq = cts.key_seq and cb.course = cts.key_course where cb.course_name like #{course_name} and cts.week like #{week} and cts.seq like #{seq} and cb.campus_id like #{campus_id}
